About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 8:30am-4:30pm (appointment desirable); closed Sat, Sun, public holidays and Christmas - New Year period. Reference assistance by mail available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3, photographs, maps and plans.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit preferable, including details regarding purpose and estimated time of research and capacity to pay if required. Proof of identity required. Access to official records is governed by Local Government Act Ordinance 55. Access to records not normally available for research can be gained by request to the Records Section or to the Library.

About.Acquisition focus: Items of historical interest about the Municipality or the elected members of Council. Members and families can search personal and compensation files.

About.Major holdings: Town Planning: Development applications 1950- (146m). Records Section: Individual properties (164m); Subject files 1974- (60m); Mixed subjects 1934-1974 (40m); Staff and aldermanic files (22m). Health and Building: Building applications.
